meanings.definition: A person's father's or mother's father.
meanings.sent1: My grandad tells the best stories about when he was young.
meanings.sent2: I visit my grandad every Sunday for lunch.
meanings.sent3: My grandad always falls asleep in his favorite chair after dinner.
meanings.sent4: To me, my grandad is like a wise old oak tree, strong and full of history.
meanings.sent5: The image of my grandad's smiling face is etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: A term of endearment for an older man.
meanings.sent1: The friendly grandad at the park always has treats for the kids.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my grandad; he's so kind and funny.
meanings.sent3: My grandad jokes that he's too old to learn how to use a smartphone.
meanings.sent4: The old man sitting on the bench reminded me of a grandad from a storybook.
meanings.sent5: The warmth of my grandad's hugs makes me feel safe and loved.
